```{r, echo = FALSE}
df = read_csv("./solubility_train.csv") %>% 
  janitor::clean_names()

fit = lm(solubility ~ ., data = df)
summary(fit)
```

```{r}
df_test = read_csv("./solubility_test.csv") %>% 
  janitor::clean_names()

pred = predict(fit, data = df_test)

MSE = mean((df_test$solubility - pred)^2)

MSE
```

```{r}
df = na.omit(df)

# Train data input matrix and response vector

x <- model.matrix(solubility~., df)
y <- pull(df, solubility)

lambda = cv.glmnet(x, y, family = "gaussian", alpha = 0)

ridge.model.min <- glmnet(x, y, standardize = TRUE, alpha = 0, lambda = lambda$lambda.min)
```

```{r}
pred_ridge = predict(ridge.model.min, s=lambda$lambda.min, newx=x)
```
